message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I'm looking to spend a bit less.  How about $105?

I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, Bob. However, I've invested a lot in this product and I need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $108.
